Entries.Tue4: It's so wonderful to be finally free to spend all the time I want with Lewis.$1
Entries.Fri4: I'm so glad that you moved here, @.$0#$b#You really have helped Lewis and I.$1

Entries.Mon4: I don't even know why I thought you would all react badly to me and Marnie dating.$0
Entries.Wed4: Hello, @.$0#$e#I can't thank you enough for encouraging me to admit my relationship publicly.$0

Entries.Tue4: It's still a little awkward to see Lewis all day at our house...$2
Entries.Wed2: I don’t know if it’s good for Jas to spend so much time with Lewis when not too long ago they were kind of strangers.$2
Entries.Sat6: Lewis will probably come by again today...$3
Entries.Sun4: Jas really likes playing with Lewis.$3#$b#Guess he's a better influence than me.$3

Entries.Mon6: Hello, Mister @.^Hello Miss @.$0#$e#Do you think Uncle Lewis will live with us someday?$3
Entries.Tue4: Are you looking for Aunt Marnie?$0#$e#Or maybe for Uncle Lewis?$1
Entries.Tue10: I like Uncle Lewis, he always plays with me when he visits Aunt Marnie.$1
Entries.Wed6: Shane and Aunt Marnie are always busy, but now I can play with Uncle Lewis!$1
Entries.Wed8: I'm going to ask Uncle Lewis if he could expand the park.$0#$b#It's enough for Vincent and I, but I want other kids to come and play with us!$1
Entries.Thu6: I should ask Uncle Lewis and Aunt Marnie to bake a pink cake with me.$1#$e#Bye!$1
Entries.Fri8: I like when Uncle Lewis comes to our house.$0#$b#He always brings me pretty fairy roses.$1
Entries.Fri10: Guess what?$0#$b#Uncle Lewis gave me a new doll yesterday.$1#$b#Do you want to play together?$0
Entries.Sat8: Tomorrow I'm going to watch the new Minsa the Fairy movie with Shane, Aunt Marnie, and Uncle Lewis!$1
Entries.Sun4: I always thought it was weird that Uncle Lewis always came to our house late at night.$3
Entries.Sun10: Uncle Lewis promised that he would take me to Zuzu City someday with Aunt Marnie.$1

Entries.spring_20: It's good to see Marnie and Lewis together.$1
Entries.summer_28: Hello, @.$0#$e#Don't tell Lewis and Marnie but...$0#$b#Everyone here in town already knew about them.$1

Entries.59020016/f Marnie 1000/f Lewis 1000/w su: nightTime/68 83/farmer 65 79 1 Lewis 69 83 1 Marnie 69 84 0/skippable/pause 1000/faceDirection Lewis 2/pause 200/emote Lewis 28/pause 350/speak Lewis "Marnie... we can't.$2#$b#If word got out, it could undermine my position of authority in the town!$2"/pause 600/faceDirection Marnie 1/pause 180/emote Marnie 12/pause 650/speak Lewis "You understand... don't you?$2"/pause 1000/speak Marnie "You care too much about your job, Lewis.$2#$b#There are other things in life, you know.$2"/pause 350/faceDirection Marnie 2/pause 800/speak Marnie "...But yes, I understand.$2#$b#I guess we'll have to keep...us...a secret.$2"/pause 900/playSound leafrustle/pause 200/faceDirection Marnie 3 true/faceDirection Lewis 3 true/showFrame Lewis 24/showFrame Marnie 16/jump Lewis/jump Marnie/shake Lewis 2000/shake Marnie 2000/pause 100/move farmer 4 0 2/pause 100/showFrame Lewis 12/showFrame Marnie 12/pause 100/faceDirection Lewis 0/faceDirection Marnie 0/pause 380/emote Lewis 16/speak Marnie "Gahh!$4"/pause 800/speak Lewis "$q 210 null#@...You overheard everything, didn't you?$2#$r 210 50 Town_Event1#Yes, I heard everything.#$r 210 -100 Town_Event2#Yes... and I think everyone should know."/pause 650/speak Lewis "I'm the Mayor and it wouldn't be appropriate for me.$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 380/speak Marnie "See, Lewis?$2#$b#@ also thinks it's not a big deal.$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 2/pause 500/speak Marnie "Lewis, please...$2#$b#I don't like to hide from others to see you.$2#$b#Sometimes Jas asks me where I go late at night and it makes me feel horrible to make up an excuse...$2"/pause 350/emote Marnie 28/pause 250/speak Marnie "We're not doing anything wrong, everyone will understand...$2"/pause 800/faceDirection Lewis 1/pause 550/emote Lewis 40/pause 800/speak Lewis "I...$2#$b#...I guess you're both right.$2"/pause 550/faceDirection Lewis 2/pause 300/speak Lewis "Marnie, I'm sorry that you've been suffering because of me.$2"/pause 500/speak Lewis "I was... insecure.$2#$b#Insecure about what people might think about us.$2"/pause 600/speak Lewis "But you have made me realise that our relationship is just ours... and yours is the only opinion that truly matters to me.$0"/pause 500/speak Lewis "Besides, it's a fact that our community here in Pelican Town is great. The townsfolk will surely be happy for us.$1"/pause 700/speak Lewis "Marnie, I promise that I'll never try to hide our relationship again.$0"/pause 380/emote Marnie 20/pause 390/faceDirection Lewis 0/pause 380/speak Lewis "And @, thanks for helping me realise I was wrong.$1"/pause 500/speak Lewis "Now, if you'll excuse us...$0"/pause 300/faceDirection Lewis 2/pause 900/end dialogue Marnie "Oh, @, I'm so happy right now...$1"

Entries.59020013/e 59020016/f Marnie 1500/f Lewi: marnieShop/1000 1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Marnie 100 100 2 Lewis 123 111 3/skippable/changeToTemporaryMap MarnieBarn false/viewport -2000 -2000/addTemporaryActor White_Chicken 16 16 8 5 2 false Animal chicken1/addTemporaryActor White_Chicken 16 16 8 9 3 false Animal chicken2/addTemporaryActor White_Chicken 16 16 7 7 1 false Animal chicken3/addTemporaryActor White_Chicken 16 16 14 11 3 false Animal chicken4/addTemporaryActor White_Chicken 16 16 9 11 2 false Animal chicken5/warp Marnie 5 3/warp Lewis 4 3/faceDirection Marnie 2/faceDirection Lewis 2/viewport 7 5 true/pause 500/move chicken5 -1 0 2 true/pause 1000/move chicken2 3 0 1 true/pause 1500/move chicken4 0 1 2 true/pause 500/speak Marnie "The small one is called Candy.$0#$b#That one over there is Honey.$0#$b#And the one with the small eyes is Lay.$0"/pause 500/speak Marnie "Jas likes to name the chickens, so I let her choose their names.$1"/pause 600/faceDirection Marnie 3/pause 300/speak Marnie "Well, what do you think?$0"/pause 320/faceDirection Lewis 2/pause 500/speak Lewis "I can see you're doing a great job with them.$1"/pause 500/speak Lewis "No wonder why the quality of your products are much higher quality than Joja's.$0"/pause 700/speak Marnie "It makes me sad to think that their chickens are not being treated well...$2"/pause 180/emote Marnie 28/pause 200/speak Lewis "Don't, Marnie, what matters is that you take care of your chickens as well as you can.$0"/pause 600/speak Marnie "Yes, okay...$2"/pause 500/speak Lewis "Look, now that I've met your chickens, why don't we go to the saloon to cheer you up?$0"/pause 650/speak Marnie "That's a great idea.$0#$b#I'll ask Penny if she can take care of Jas.$0"/pause 600/speak Lewis "And maybe Shane wants to come with us.$0"/pause 600/speak Marnie "Yeah, let's go.$1"/pause 180/emote Marnie 32/pause 200/move Marnie 0 2 2/end dialogue Lewis "I want Marnie to enjoy life everyday.$1"

Entries.Tue6: Oh, @, I'm so thankful that you convinced Lewis that night.$1#$b#If you ever need anything, just tell me!$1
Entries.Thu6: Caroline invited Lewis and I to have tea with her.$0#$b#I'm looking forward to it, her sunroom is beautiful.$1
Entries.Sun6: Lewis sometimes comes and helps me with the animals.$0

Entries.Tue6: I regret hiding my relationship with Marnie for so long.$2#$b#I knew Marnie was hurting but I was a coward...$2
Entries.Thu6: Hello, @.$0#$bMarnie has been giving me ideas on how to improve our town.$1
Entries.Sun6: Hello, @$0#$e#I have never had animals on my own, but I think Marnie's like me.$1

Entries.Mon10: Lewis is so kind to Jas, I love that side of him.$1#$b#And Jas adores to play with Lewis.$1
Entries.Tue10: Lewis can easily get stressed over his work as Mayor.$0#$b#When that happens, I invite him to come over and we have dinner with Shane and Jas.$1
Entries.Wed10: Truth is, between Shane, Jas and the animals, I don’t get much time alone with Lewis.$2
Entries.Thu10: Lewis loves me just the way I am.$1#$b#That's one of the reasons I think he's the one for me.$1
Entries.Fri10: Shane loves pizza, so Lewis is trying to learn how to make it.$1#$b#I think he is going to ask Gus for help.$1
Entries.Sat10: Sometimes I get behind on my household chores.$0#$b#Now that I can freely be with Lewis, I've been distracted from everything else.$0
Entries.Sun10: Lewis's house is so peaceful...$0#$e#Oh, it's not like I don't like having Jas and Shane around.$0#$b#Sometimes I just need some time to relax.$0
Entries.spring_Mon10: Hello, @.$0#$e#Spring is the season of love.$1#$e#I should visit Lewis more often.$1
Entries.spring_Wed10: Jas went with Vincent to play in the forest last week.$0#$b#She picked up daffodils for Lewis, Shane and me.$1#$e#She is such a good kid.$1
Entries.spring_Thu10: Hello, @.$0#$e#Yesterday Lewis brought me a bouquet of flowers.$1#$e#He's so romantic...$1
Entries.summer_Tue10: Maybe I'll go to the beach with Jas and Lewis today.$0#$b#Vincent should come with us too, I'll tell Jodi.$1
Entries.summer_Wed10: If we were just younger, maybe Lewis and I would think about having kids.$3
Entries.summer_Fri10: I think the animals are getting very attached to Lewis.$1#$b#Especially our cow Chenny.$1#$e#Have a good day!$1
Entries.fall_Tue10: Hello, @.$0#$e#Don't forget to store enough hay for the winter.$0#$e#Lewis is helping me to prepare everything I need.$0#$e#But he's kind of clumsy with the animals.$1
Entries.fall_Sat10: Lewis has a lot of work during Fall.$0#$b#The fair is an important event for the town because it brings in a lot of tourists.$1
Entries.fall_Sun10: Lewis helped Jas with her homework yesterday.$0#$e#Also, he bought a new book for her to read.$1#$e#They're getting along really well.$1
Entries.winter_Mon10: I have so many things to be grateful for this year.$0#$b#I'm looking forward to spending the next year with the ones I love.$1
Entries.winter_Thu10: Winter is one of my favorite seasons.$0#$e#Well... it's when I spend the most time with Lewis.$1
Entries.winter_Sat10: Hello, @.$0#$e#Our cow Lulu gave birth last night.$0#$b#Lewis told me to name the baby after him.$1
Entries.spring_7: Hello, @.$0#$e#Jas is going to help me bake a cake for Lewis.$1#$b#You didn't know? It's his birthday today.$1
Entries.summer_10: Lewis and I already chose the ingredients for tomorrow.$0#$b#I'm sure you'll bring something excellent too.$1
Entries.fall_15: I'm going to gather my best products for tomorrow's fair.$0#$b#I hope I can win.$0#$b#Oh, but don't worry, Lewis is going to be fair.$0
Entries.spring_7_2: Hello, @.$0#$e#Jas is going to help me bake a cake for Lewis.$1#$b#You didn't know? It's his birthday today.$1
Entries.summer_10_2: Lewis and I already chose the ingredients for tomorrow.$0#$b#I'm sure you'll bring something excellent too.$1
Entries.fall_15_2: I'm going to gather my best products for tomorrow's fair.$0#$b#I hope I can win.$0#$b#Oh, but don't worry, Lewis is going to be fair.$0

Entries.Mon10: I love visiting Marnie, her house is always so lively.$1#$e#I've realised that it's upsetting sometimes to live alone.$2
Entries.Tue10: Hello, @!$1#$e#I have a special date with Marnie today, that's why I'm so pleased.$1#$e#I was nice talking to you. I have to leave now, have a good day!$1
Entries.Wed10: Jas asked me to expand the park so that she and Vincent don't argue anymore about who can ride on the swing first.$0#$b#Kids are so adorable.$1
Entries.Thu10: I remember when Marnie moved in like it was yesterday.$0#$b#She looked so beautiful in that yellow dress.$1
Entries.Fri10: Hello, @.$0#$e#Marnie and I are going to meet in the saloon later.$0#$b#Shane will also be there.$1#$e#You should come, too.$1
Entries.Sat10: Marnie tells me that Penny is a great teacher for the kids.$0#$e#Maybe I should think of building a school in town.$0
Entries.Sun10: Jas and Shane are good kids.$0#$b#They always welcome me when I go to their house.$1
Entries.spring_Tue10: Marnie and I are going to take Jas to the forest this weekend.$0#$e#She said that she wanted to look for dandelions.$1
Entries.spring_Wed10: Hello, @.$0#$e#Spring is such a romantic season.$0#$b#Right, @?$1
Entries.spring_Fri10: It was around this time of year I asked Marnie on our first date...$0#$b#We went to the Secret Woods and had a picnic.$1
Entries.summer_Mon10: Hello, @.$0#$e#I'm going to have dinner at Marnie's house today.$0#$b#We are making a pizza!$1#$b#Shane is going to love it.$1
Entries.summer_Wed10: I don't think Marnie and I will ever have kids.$0#$b#We're just too old for it.$0#$b#Plus Jas is already like our kid.$1
Entries.summer_Thu10: Jas likes to go to the beach these days.$1#$b#She plays with Vincent while Marnie and I sunbathe.$1
Entries.fall_Tue10: Marnie and I have talked about moving in together, but I don't think we're going to.$0
Entries.fall_Sat10: Hello, @.$0#$e#Shane and I helped Marnie with the chickens yesterday.$1#$b#Now that winter is coming, she's really busy preparing everything.$0
Entries.fall_Sun10: Hello, @.$0#$e#I've been very busy these days because of the fair.$0#$e#I miss Marnie...$2
Entries.winter_Thu10: Hello, @.$0#$e#Winter is the best season to be with your partner.$1
Entries.winter_Fri10: What a wonderful day.$0#$b#I should visit Marnie today.$1
Entries.winter_Sun10: Hello, @.$0#$e#You know, your grandfather always knew that Marnie and I had something special.$0
Entries.spring_23: If I weren't so old, I would ask Marnie to dance with me at the Flower Dance.$1
Entries.fall_18: Hello, @.$0#$e#Today's is Marnie's birthday, so I'll invite her over for dinner.$1
Entries.winter_24: Hello, @.$0#$e#Are you ready for the Feast of the Winter Star?$0#$b#Marnie and I bought a doll house for Jas and some beers for Shane.$1
Entries.spring_23_2: If I weren't so old, I would ask Marnie to dance with me at the Flower Dance.$1
Entries.fall_18_2: Hello, @.$0#$e#Today's is Marnie's birthday, so I'll invite her over for dinner.$1
Entries.winter_24_2: Hello, @.$0#$e#Are you ready for the Feast of the Winter Star?$0#$b#Marnie and I bought a doll house for Jas and some beers for Shane.$1

Entries.Mon8: Shane and Lewis have gotten closer these days.$0#$b#Lewis thinks of him like his son.$0
Entries.Wed8: Looking back, maybe it was noticeable that there was something between me and Lewis...$2
Entries.Fri8: Lewis's house is always tidy and neat.$0#$e#I could never manage that with Jas and Shane around.$3
Entries.Sat8: It’s really embarrassing to think about how Lewis and I used to meet in secret...$2#$b#I can't help you enough for your help, @.$0

Entries.Tue8: Hello, @.$0#$e#Have you seen Marnie today? She looks beautiful.$1
Entries.Fri8: Hello, @.$0#$e#Marnie and I like to go to the saloon on Fridays.$1#$b#You should join us today.$1
Entries.Sat8: @, if you ever need help you can come to Marnie or me.$0#$b#We will gladly help you.$1
Entries.Sun8: Marnie wants to learn some gardening.$0#$e#Luckily she has the best teacher in town.$1

Entries.Mon8: Marnie seems happier with Lewis.$0#$e#She deserves some time for herself, after having to raise Jas so unexpectedly.$0
Entries.Tue8: It's good that Jas spends time with Marnie and Lewis.$0#$e#They're good influences for her.$0
Entries.Wed8: Lewis has helped me to be a better person for Marnie and Jas.$3#$b#I'm thankful for that, I really need some encouragement to keep my mind focused.$0
Entries.Thu8: Now it feels natural for Jas and me to have dinner with Lewis.$0
Entries.Sun8: I guess Marnie, Jas, Lewis and I are some kind of weird family now.$0#$e#Feels good, though.$0

Entries.Town_Event1: Please don't tell anyone, the town can't know this...$2
Entries.Town_Event2: No... the town can't know this...$2

may not be my business, but it sure is affecting Marnie.$0"/pause 700/speak Shane "...$2"/pause 700/speak Lewis "Look, Shane, I've known you for a long time, and even though you don't like to be close to many people, I know that Marnie and Jas are important to you.$0#$b#And they are important to me, too.$0"/pause 600/speak Lewis "Shane, please, we don't have to be friends, but could we at least have a cordial relationship from now on?$0#$b#My relationship with Marnie is serious, and your opinion really matters to me.$0#$b#You know, Shane, I don't have any kids... but I’d like to think of you and Jas as my own children.$0"/pause 600/speak Lewis "You're a good man, Shane, and lately you've been improving so much.$0#$b#@ has helped you, right?$0#$b#Well, I know that maybe you won't want my father...$2#$b#...so I don't think I can think of you as one.$2"/pause 500/emote Shane 40/pause 500/speak Shane "But I guess we have a deal.$0"/pause 500/speak Shane "But you have to invite me for a beer.$0"/pause 600/speak Lewis "Done deal.$1#$b#Let's head back over with Marnie.$0"/pause 380/move Lewis 0 -1 1/end dialogue Marnie "I don't know what Lewis said to Shane, but they are getting along better now.$1"

Entries.59020015/e 59020014/f Marnie 2000/f Lewi: sweet/40 11/farmer 100 100 0 Marnie 42 10 2 Lewis 41 10 2/skippable/pause 1500/speak Marnie "I love spending time with you, Lewis.$1"/pause 600/speak Lewis "Me too.$1"/pause 700/speak Lewis "I feel like we're creating a family in our own way.$0#$b#I was really lonely before I met you, Marnie.$2#$b#I never got married or had kids, so I have lived alone for a long time...$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 1/pause 250/faceDirection Marnie 3/pause 500/speak Lewis "Having you Jas and Shane in my life truly brings me joy.$1"/pause 700/speak Marnie "I should be the one thanking you, Lewis.$1#$b#It was difficult to take care of them alone...$2"/pause 1300/speak Lewis "I also want to apologise to you for how I behaved in the past...$2#$b#I don't think I have ever told you how much I regret hiding our relationship...$2"/pause 380/speak Lewis "I'm sorry that you suffered so much because of me...$2#$b#I am not trying to justify myself, but I thought that it would damage my position as Mayor.$2"/pause 380/speak Lewis "I just want you to know that if I could go back in time, I wouldn't have done things the way I did.$2"/pause 1000/speak Lewis "I...$0#$b#...I love you, Marnie, I mean it.$0"/pause 380/emote Marnie 20/pause 500/speak Marnie "Oh, Lewis, you don't have to worry about anything.$1#$b#Maybe I was also a little bit afraid...$3"/pause 500/speak Marnie "But we're where we want to be now, Lewis.$1"/pause 700/speak Marnie "I love you too, Lewis.$1"/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite heart 42 10/pause 900/end dialogue Marnie "Oh, @, I have never been happier.$1"
